title: 1934년 Kravech 사건
summary: 미국 New York, NY 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Kravech. 판결일: 1934-09-15. 법원: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: John Kravech v. James O. Sebring and Mary A. B. Sebring
**판결일**: 1934-09-15
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

## 인용

- 242 A.D. 750

## 판결문 요약


Order as to defendant James 0. Sebring affirmed, with ten dollars costs and disbursements, and as to defendant Mary A. B. Sebring reversed on the law, with ten dollars costs and disbursements, and motion granted dismissing the complaint as to her, with ten dollars costs. All concur. Present — Sears, P. J., Taylor, Edgcomb, Thompson and Crosby, JJ.
...
